synopsis.text: Medhi, Wise, and the rest of the gang are in for a treat as Shirase extends an invitation to a picturesque beach resort, a well-deserved reward for their successful quests. Donning their swimwear, they revel in the sun-soaked festivities, but Masato finds it challenging to relax with his mother around. An unexpected mishap leaves Masato with amnesia, and he struggles to recall even Mamako. In his confused state, he begins to see her as an alluring older woman, rather than his doting mother. As Masato becomes increasingly infatuated with her, his focus shifts away from their in-game adventure, which could spell trouble for everyone involved. Will Masato's memories return, or will he remain enthralled by Mamako's charm? All the while, they must navigate this RPG world, where Mamako's unparalleled skills as a dual-wielding, multi-target specialist often steal the spotlight from her son.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
